summary: Frontend testing completed for Elvis-Manager ERP Marketing Module. All pages load correctly with the new modern UI (black sidebar, white content, #AE1F25 red accents). Login works with admin/admin123. All Marketing module pages (Leads, WhatsApp, Campaigns, Market Insights) display correctly with proper stats, navigation, and forms.

issues: Tailwind CDN warning: 'cdn.tailwindcss.com should not be used in production' - recommend installing Tailwind as PostCSS plugin for production
Two 404 errors on page load (likely favicon or static assets) - minor, doesn't affect functionality

action_items: Consider installing Tailwind CSS as PostCSS plugin instead of CDN for production deployment
Fix 404 errors for missing static resources (favicon, etc.)
critical_code_review_comments: Google Contacts sync and WhatsApp Meta Cloud API are MOCKED - need real integration for production
All data-testid attributes are properly implemented for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All Marketing module pages tested and working. Pages tested: /marketing/leads/, /marketing/whatsapp/, /marketing/campaigns/, /marketing/insights/, /marketing/lead/new/, /marketing/whatsapp/provider/new/, /marketing/campaign/new/. Sidebar navigation works correctly. Color scheme verified: black sidebar (rgb(0,0,0)) with #AE1F25 red accents.

login.details: Login with admin/admin123 works, redirects to dashboard

leads_page.details: Displays stats (Total, WIN, LOSS, Conversion Rate), Add Lead button, Sync Google Contacts button, leads table

whatsapp_dashboard.details: Displays stats (Messages Today, Delivered, Templates, Active Events), Providers/Templates/Events/Logs navigation cards, Add Provider button

campaigns_page.details: Displays campaign count, Create Campaign button, empty state message

market_insights.details: Displays stats (Total Leads, Orders, Revenue, States), Hot Markets/Cold Zones/New Markets sections, State-wise Performance table

add_lead_form.details: Form loads with Basic Information, Location, Assignment & Follow-up sections

add_provider_form.details: Form loads with Provider Details, API Credentials (Meta Cloud API fields), Webhook Configuration

create_campaign_form.details: Form loads with Campaign Details, Message Configuration, Scheduling, Attribution Settings

sidebar_navigation.details: All Marketing nav links work (Leads, WhatsApp, Campaigns, Market Insights)

color_scheme.details: Black sidebar (rgb(0,0,0)), white content area, #AE1F25 red accents on active items and badges
